completion.item: <[!CDATA[Adds a selection listener on the treeParameters: gara.jswt.SelectionListener listener - the desired listener to be added to this treeThrows: TypeError - if the listener is not a SelectionListener ]]>

<[!CDATA[Deselects a specific itemParameters:
gara.jswt.TreeItem item - the item to deselect
				]]>

<[!CDATA[Returns a specifiy item with a zero-related indexParameters: int index - the zero-related indexThrows: gara.OutOfBoundsException - if the index does not live within this treeReturns: the item ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the amount of the items in the treeReturns: the amount ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns an array with all the items in the treeReturns: an array with the items ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns whether the lines of the tree are visible or notReturns: true if the lines are visible and false if they are not ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns an array with the items which are currently selected in the treeReturns:an array with items ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the amount of the selected items in the treeReturns: the amount ]]>

<[!CDATA[Looks for the index of a specified itemParameters: gara.jswt.TreeItem item - the item for the indexThrows: gara.jswt.ItemNotExistsException - if the item does not exist in this treeTypeError - if the item is not a TreeItemReturns: the index of the specified item ]]>

<[!CDATA[Removes a selection listener from this treeParameters: gara.jswt.SelectionListener listener - the listener to be removed from this treeThrows: TypeError - if the listener is not a SelectionListener ]]>

<[!CDATA[Sets lines visible or invisible.Parameters:
boolean show - true if the lines should be visible or false for invisibility
				]]>
